titleStmt.title: A declaration or ordinance of the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament concerning the seizing of horses for his Excellency the Earl of Essex : with a provision that this ordinance shall not extend to the seizing or taking of any horses, mares, or geldings
Laws, etc.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales.

notesStmt.note: The declaration was separately issued as a broadside with caption "Die mercurii, 7 junii; 1643", the order was separately issued as a broadside with title "An order concerning the price of coales".
Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
